ProjectTitle: Kinetic Modelling of Novel Solar Wind Observations
InitialFeedbackHistory:
26/04/2024
At this stage of your fellowship FWO expects a detailed DMP using the Flemish standard DMP template. You can find this template in dmponline.be with guidance per question; or as word template on https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/ where you you can also read the FWO regulations. For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance
label: good with suggestions
